song.title: Overtime
song.lyrics:
Yeah, mmmm
Oh-oh, oh-oh, oh-oh, oh, oh
Hey no, no, no, no, no, no
Oh whoa, oh, oh, oh, oh, yeah
Say, she waan the work
Say, she waan the work
'Cause she tired of the 9 to 5
So me chip in the overdrive
And me give her the overtime
My love keep her alive
About me she a fantasize
'Cause she love off me style
And she love off me smile
The way me treat her so nice
Oh
Gyal, make me see your application
Make me employ you
You know you fit the position
From the first time I saw you
Make me see your application
Make me employ you
You know you fit the position
From the first time I saw you
She waan fi come 'pon me side
But she tell me say, she don't have no shovel
But that could a cause a little trouble
Because my shovel, you have to pay a double, oh!
Say she can mix concrete
So she want me be show her how fi do it
So me tell her fi bend her back
Gyal, hold the shovel like that
Yeah!
Gyal, make me see your application
Make me employ you
You know you fit the position
From the first time I saw you
Make me see your application
Make me employ you
You know you fit the position
From the first time I saw you
Baby, me a rock you
Like a thumbtack, baby me a tack you
Like a country man, gyal me a go chop you
Like a baller for the goal me a go score you
Me have the thing weh make you whine and a twang, yeah
And the things weh make you talk and chat say
Make you say, "Uno, dos, tres, cuatro, cinco"
'Quint your eyes, look 'round and 'round and watch me
I like it baby
The you whining on me, girl
I like it, yeah
The way that you whine on me
I like it, oh
Oh oh, oh oh oh
A the first time she ever get it like that
When me start it first time she never want it not to stop
Do it from the front, and me catch it from the back
She go run, a her friend she a chat
She say, "play, play with me baby"
And me say, "Whine 'pon me my lady"
I love it when you do it like that
Mmmm, me never, never want you fi stop
Oh girl, I like it that way
And me never, never want you fi stop
I like it that way, baby
Me no care, here I waan you come back
I like it that way
Me riddim, a that you a play
And when you talk the sweet things dem to me
And you say nobody can do it like me
Bubble for me like never before, before..

example_sentences: She waan fi go a di party.
Di gyal look nice inna di dress.

vocabulary.explanation: To or for (used as a preposition).
example_sentences: Mi a go fi di food.
Dem love fi chat too much.
She a whine to di music.

vocabulary.explanation: Rhythm or beat, especially in music.
To work or perform at a high level of intensity.
example_sentences: Mi put di car inna overdrive.
Him a work inna overdrive mode.

vocabulary.explanation: To attach or fasten, often used metaphorically.
example_sentences: Mi a tack di poster pon di wall.
Him tack di idea to di project.

vocabulary.explanation: To cut or strike, often used metaphorically.
example_sentences: Mi a go chop di wood.

vocabulary.explanation: To dance with a bouncing motion.
example_sentences: She a bubble to di song.

vocabulary.explanation: To lean or curve, often used in dance.
example_sentences: Di tree bend inna di wind.

vocabulary.explanation: A tool for digging, used metaphorically here.
example_sentences: Use di shovel fi dig di hole.
Him need a shovel fi di work.

vocabulary.explanation: To hire or make use of.
example_sentences: Mi waan fi employ a new worker.
She employ di skills she learn.

vocabulary.explanation: To imagine or dream about something.
A distinctive manner or way of doing something.

example_sentences: Her smile bright up di room.
Him always have a smile pon him face.
Di music make mi feel alive.
Fill out di application fi di job.
She score high pon di test.

vocabulary.explanation: A building material, used metaphorically here.
example_sentences: Mix di concrete fi di foundation.

vocabulary.explanation: Twice as much or twice the amount.

example_sentences: Di first time mi see yuh, mi know.
Him tell her fi stop di noise.

vocabulary.explanation: To engage in an activity for enjoyment.

example_sentences: Mi waan fi talk to yuh.
